reference_a:
@article{soyster2022,
  title = {Pooled and person-specific machine learning models for predicting future alcohol consumption, craving, and wanting to drink: {{A}} demonstration of parallel utility.},
  shorttitle = {Pooled and person-specific machine learning models for predicting future alcohol consumption, craving, and wanting to drink},
  author = {Soyster, Peter D. and Ashlock, Leighann and Fisher, Aaron J.},
  date = {2022-05},
  journaltitle = {Psychology of Addictive Behaviors},
  shortjournal = {Psychology of Addictive Behaviors},
  volume = {36},
  number = {3},
  pages = {296--306},
  issn = {1939-1501, 0893-164X},
  doi = {10.1037/adb0000666}
}
additional_comments: no beep information available but there may be information in the original code that can be used to create it; number of max. time points taken as maximum of observations in data

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: drink_number
features.coding: Since your last survey; how many alcoholic drinks have you had?
features.details: Since your last survey; how many alcoholic drinks have you had?
features.construct: alcohol, substance use

features.name: comfortable
features.coding:
I feel comfortable in my current location
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel comfortable in my current location
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: comfortable, positive affect, affect, situation, context

features.name: stressed
features.coding:
I feel stressed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel stressed
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: stress, negative affect, affect

features.name: depressed
features.coding:
I feel down/depressed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel down/depressed
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: depression, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five, psychopathology

features.name: calm
features.coding:
I feel calm/relaxed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel calm/relaxed
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: calmness, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: pressure_to_drink
features.coding:
I currently feel pressure to drink
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I currently feel pressure to drink
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: substance use pressure, alcohol, substance use

features.name: enthusiastic
features.coding:
I feel enthusiastic
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel enthusiastic
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: enthusiasm, positive affect, affect, extraversion, big five

features.name: happy
features.coding:
I feel happy
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel happy
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: happiness, positive affect, affect

features.name: conflict
features.coding:
I am having conflict/fighting with others
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I am having conflict/fighting with others
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: social conflict, social behavior, social stress

features.name: craving
features.coding:
I am craving alcohol
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I am craving alcohol
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: craving, alcohol, substance use

features.name: impulsive
features.coding:
I am feeling impulsive
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I am feeling impulsive
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: impulsivity, self-control

features.name: drink_feel_better
features.coding:
A drink would make me feel better right now
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: A drink would make me feel better right now
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: substance use expectancy, alcohol, substance use

features.name: perceived_peer_drinking
features.coding: What % of [university] students do you think are drinking alcohol right now?
features.details: What % of [university] students do you think are drinking alcohol right now?
features.construct: substance use norms, alcohol, substance use

features.name: want_to_drink
features.coding:
I would like to drink
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I would like to drink
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: substance use desire, alcohol, substance use

features.name: delay_gratification
features.coding:
I feel able to delay gratification
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel able to delay gratification
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: self-control

features.name: angry
features.coding:
I feel angry
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: I feel angry
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: anger, negative affect, affect

features.name: drinks_today_estimate
features.coding: How many drinks do you think you'll consume today?
features.details: How many drinks do you think you'll consume today?
features.construct: substance use intention, alcohol, substance use

features.name: restless_sleep
features.coding:
Last night, my sleep was restless or unsatisfying
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: Last night, my sleep was restless or unsatisfying
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: sleep difficulty, sleep quality, sleep

features.name: sleep_difficulty
features.coding:
Last night, I had difficulty falling or staying asleep
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.details: Last night, I had difficulty falling or staying asleep
features.labels:
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible
features.construct: sleep difficulty, sleep quality, sleep

features.name: sleep_duration
features.coding: How many hours did you sleep last night?
features.details: How many hours did you sleep last night?
features.construct: sleep duration, sleep
